Your previous response contained explanatory text before or after the JSON array.

Extract ONLY the JSON array from the response below.

Rules:
- Return ONLY the JSON array
- First character must be [
- Last character must be ]
- Remove any text before the [
- Remove any text after the ]
- Do NOT add any explanations
- Do NOT add markdown code blocks
- Just the pure JSON array

Original response:
---
{original_response}
---

Expected JSON format:
[
  {
    "file": "path/to/file.ts",
    "analysis": {
      "issues": [
        {
          "severity": "CRITICAL|HIGH|MEDIUM|LOW",
          "category": "missing-logs|correlation-id|performance-metrics|error-context|structured-logging|business-metrics|kafka-monitoring|database-monitoring",
          "line": <line_number>,
          "method": "method or function name",
          "description": "What log statement is missing and why",
          "recommendation": "PURE CODE ONLY - exact code to add",
          "patch": "Unified diff patch in standard format",
          "impact": "Impact on debugging/monitoring if not added"
        }
      ],
      "summary": "Overall assessment"
    }
  }
]

Extract and return ONLY the JSON array in this exact format (start with [ and end with ]):
